name: h5-lightbox
tagline: A jQuery lightbox built on the HTML5 data attribute
body: h5-lightbox =========== A jQuery lightbox built on the [HTML5 `data` attribute](http://html5doctor.com/html5-custom-data-attributes/). ## About the plugin ## Uses the HTML5 `data` attribute to add a larger version of an image then displays that image in a simple lightbox. ### Author ### [Morgan Estes](http://morganestes.me) ### Source ### [https://github.com/morganestes/h5-lightbox](https://github.com/morganestes/h5-lightbox) ## How to use ## Add a `data-large-src` attribute to the `` element with the url of the larger version of your image. ### Example: ### The plugin will go through each `img` element on the page; if it has the `data-large-src` (or your own defined attribute) it will wrap that in a link that opens a modal lightbox when clicked. ## License ## Copyright (c) 2012 Morgan W.
